Want your plane stay between two zero'es mentioned above?

Don't listen those two "The"'s. Just adjust the pressure dial on your altimeter, and let your play stay where it stays.

All you need to do is give him your social security number!

Just eat food to solve all of your hunger needs!

• There are lots of tricks out there on how to most effectively or quickly cut an apple into small pieces, but what if you could bypass all that messy cutting (which also means you have to clean the knife and the worktop!)? Imagine if you could accomplish the same task without any tools or any mess! Well, there's a better way, if you know how! An apple's skin is actually quite weak and cutting through it with a knife is overkill. All you need to do is hold the apple in your hand (from the side) and bite a chunk out of the fruit. Here's the important bit: keep that chunk in your mouth and chew it, then swallow it just like you would do with a neatly-cut piece of apple if you had done this the slow way. With a little practice, you can consume almost the entire apple this way, and you'll waste much less of the tasty fruit, because you can bite right down to the core, without having to throw away anything that could be eaten.

Next time you see someone cutting an apple into delicate pieces, you can smugly sit there knowing that you could eat an entire fruit before they are even ready to start on theirs!
